name: Caroline
content: I want to experiment with tropical cooking, but it's hard to find any ingredients. If someone could ship 100 (Taro Root / Ginger / Pineapple), it might help!

name: Gus
content: I've got the urge to make my famous giant omelet... but I'll need two dozen eggs. Any takers?

name: Linus
content: I have an idea. There's a lot of trash in the water. Why don't we fish some out to make the valley more beautiful?
